message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. We can always negotiate from here.
I'll take a slightly better offer. You can do better than this, Alice!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better ratio than last time. This is my best offer so far.
I'm not budging on the ratio, Alice. You're going to have to do better than that!
I'm trying to find a middle ground, Bob. This is my next best offer. Meet me in the middle?
I'm not willing to compromise further. I think I have the upper hand now. You're going to have to make a better offer if you want to get a bigger share!
I'm running out of room to maneuver, Bob. This is my last chance to get a decent share. Meet me at 32-68?
